short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import games from chess.com to lichess with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As soon as your game finishes on chess.com, click this extension and find yourself magically transported to the lichess analysis board.
